title: Made a meme of an islamophobic or corrupt political leader #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: shum so there's a political leader in my country and uh that particular leader is extremely I mean they're very anti-islamic so a few days ago I made a meme regarding them and I called them overweight in that Meme and that Meme went viral but now I'm realizing if I did a sin or not and it's been 3 to 4 days and not been able to get this thought out of my mind is he Muslim no no they're not Muslim no problem inshallah just try not to be caught
